#summary &uuml character entity

#sidebar TOCCharacterEntitiesU

You are here: [Welcome Home] > [HtmlReference HTML Reference] > [CharacterEntities Character entities] > [CharacterEntitiesU U] > &uuml

== Value ==

There are 4 variations of this entity:

  * `&Uuml;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/00dc/index.htm U+000DC].
  * `&Uuml` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/00dc/index.htm U+000DC].
  * `&uuml;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/00fc/index.htm U+000FC].
  * `&uuml` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/00fc/index.htm U+000FC].
